description:
From your morning coffee stop, to an afternoon hike, to the evening at the pub, the Rydr Pants can do it all. Burly construction and tough materials mean this pant is ready for spontaneous adventures. Subtle styling and classic lines mean they fit in well wherever your day takes you.

  • KÜHL’s Full fit has been designed with movement in mind, adding more room through the seat and thighs for a more relaxed fit
  • Free Ride™ waistband is lined with ultra suede, a soft synthetic that feels great
  • Articulated knees so the pant moves when you move, with no restrictions and no bunching
  • Born Free™ gusseted crotch means no more blow-outs and more comfort
  • Standard 5-pocket layout with an additional stealthy drop-in phone pocket gives you plenty of space for your daily kit
  • Reinforced pocket edges and scuff guards add extra strength where it is needed most
name: Kuhl Rydr Pants - Men's
